alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:18AM EDT until April 05 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Buren County in southwestern Michigan... Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... Southwestern Barry County in southwestern Michigan... Northwestern Kalamazoo County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 800 AM EDT. * At 717 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paw Paw, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Hastings... Allegan... South Haven... Paw Paw... Otsego... Plainwell... Hartford... Mattawan... Bangor... Fennville... Saugatuck... Martin... Westwood... Van Buren SP... Lake Michigan Beach... Alamo... Orangeville... Pine Grove... Covert... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
